document_data.name: Tallstones
document_data.mainbody: '''Tallstones''' was a manor in [[Athkatla]], and the residence of the heads of the [[Phaerdinzer]] clan during the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Interior: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Tallstones was the residence of [[Othlo Phaerdinzer]] and [[Jasurra Phaerdinzer]]. They liked to be naked, and float everywhere with their magic inside the house; their windows and doors were boarded up, with the inside of the house full of tinkling, ethereal music and magically created lights.
